content: w&t row 8 p until 15 sts remain w&t row 9 k until 12 sts remain w&t row 10 p until 12 sts remain w&t row 11 k across to end of row row 12 k9 p until 9 sts remain k9 short row shaping for the neckline is now complete ©vraja leader - @tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 4 of 9 the rest of the yoke is worked as follows rs k making raglan increases as before ws k9 p slipping markers until 9 sts remain k9 work 4 more row in purple begin working in curry work 8 row in curry continuing raglan increases on rs row *note row 4 and 8 in curry are worked differently to other ws row all stitches are knitted except raglan stitches which are purled row 4 and 8 ws k until first marker sm p1 sm k sleeve sts to m sm p1 sm k back sts to m sm p1 sm k sleeve sts to m sm p1 sm k to end begin working in white work 12 row continuing to work raglan increases *note that 3rd row in white is a buttonhole row remembering raglan increases make the buttonhole as before girls at the end of the row boys at the start girl buttonhole row k until 7 sts remain make buttonhole k to end of row boy buttonhole row k4 make buttonhole k to end of row this concludes the raglan increases 233 sts on the next row 13th row in white remove markers and separate sleeves and body as follows casting on sts for underarms using the cable cast on method raglan sts are part of the body k38 sts place next 45 sts on holder cast on 4 underarm sts k67 sts place next 45 sts on holder cast on 4 underarm sts k38 sts 151 sts body buttonhole row will be noted and will be worked in the same way as the previous buttonhole row with the exception of the curry diamond patterned section and buttonhole row the body is worked as follows rs row k ws row k9 p until 9 sts remain k9 work 5 more row in white this will mean that in total you have worked 18 row in white begin working in blue work 2 row ©vraja leader - @tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 5 of 9 begin working in azur blue work 6 row *note that row 5 in azur blue is a buttonhole row begin working in curry work 2 row in the normal way then begin diamond pattern diamond pattern is an 8 row repeating pattern repeat the full 8 row pattern 3 times then work pattern row 1 again to complete diamond section * note that the 3rd time working pattern row 3 is a buttonhole row row 1 k15 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 16 sts remain p1 k15 row 2 and 8 k9 p5 *k1 p1 k1 p5 repeat from *
